rows.label: qst702202_msg0001
rows.name: Well, this is quite...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0002
rows.name: It looks vicious, to say the least.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0003
rows.name:
Did he really go into that
den? I can't believe he
made it back alive...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0004
rows.name:
Veritas has always been lucky.
He has no shortage of stories
like this from his youth.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0005
rows.name:
Above all, he's serious and honest.
If he says it, it must be true.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0006
rows.name:
You're so calm. What will you do
if we can't get the key back?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, we'll cross that
bridge when we come to it.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0008
rows.name:
Besides, the most important
things aren't in the vault.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0009
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0010
rows.name:
Even if they're not the most
important, there are still
important things, right?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0011
rows.name:
Then I still think we should
do everything we can.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0012
rows.name: Thank you, Laura.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0013
rows.name:
It seems it's still upset
about the intrusion.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0014
rows.name: So, we either have to lure it out...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0015
rows.name: Or defeat it and proceed.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0016
rows.name: In that case...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0101
rows.name:
What should we do about
the Grafton Feris?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0102
rows.name: Lure it out with bait.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0103
rows.name: Defeat it here.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0201
rows.name:
For example, could we
distract it with something?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0202
rows.name: ...Use a decoy?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0203
rows.name: Why are you looking at me?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0204
rows.name: Let's use bait.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0205
rows.name:
Let's procure some Urbs Armus. There
should be some living nearby.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0206
rows.name:
I see. It probably eats
them normally, so it's less
likely to be suspicious.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0207
rows.name: You're so reliable.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0208
rows.name: I'm not a mercenary for nothing.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0209
rows.name:
Though I never thought my skills
would be useful in this way.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0210
rows.name:
Urbs Armus, right? I hope we
can find them quickly...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0301
rows.name:
It would be terrible if someone
else got attacked. Let's defeat
it before that happens.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0302
rows.name: A sound argument.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0303
rows.name: Laura, don't overdo it.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0304
rows.name: I know.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0305
rows.name: Alright then... let's go!
